downloadDescription: This documentation provides programming reference and how-to topics for getting started with the Bing Maps REST Services, in the form of a CHM file.
detailsSection: This documentation provides programming reference and how-to topics for getting started with the Bing Maps REST Services, in the form of a CHM file.
systemRequirementsSection: This documentation is in the form of a .chm file, which requires Internet Explorer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Save the CHM file to your computer.

  2. Double-click the CHM file to open it.

  3. If the CHM file does not work correctly, you may have to unblock the CHM file. To unblock the file:
    • Right click the file, and select Properties.
    • On the General tab look for an Unblock button. If the file is not blocked, this button does not appear.
    • Click the Unblock button, and then click OK to close the dialog box.
    • Double-click the CHM file to open it, and it should work correctly.
